citation.article-title: Transfer of Bacteroides succinogenes (Hungate) to Fibrobacter gen. nov. as Fibrobacter succinogenes comb. nov. and description of Fibrobacter intestinalis sp. nov.

p.s: Description of Fibrobacter succinogenes subsp. efongata subsp. nov.
Fibrobacter succinogenes subsp. efongata (e.lon.gata L. fem. part. adj. elongata, elongated)
Fibrobacter succinogenes subsp. efongata includes the strains with slender, rod-shaped cells (see reference 27 for photomicrographs); PABA is required.
The type strain is strain HM2 (= ATCC 43856).
